root.message: The SDG_INDICATOR field for indicator 8-9-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: 8.9.1 Direct Gross Value Added by Tourism (VABDT) as a percentage of total GDP and the growth rate
8.9.1 Valor Acrescentado Bruto Directo do Turismo (VABDT) em percentagem do PIB total e a taxa de crescimento
